_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four ways of living together [an4.54: A male zombie living with a female zombie
A male zombie living with a goddess
A god living with a female zombie
A god living with a goddess
How a male zombie lives with a female zo: The husband kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct
The husband uses speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
The husband is covetous, malicious, and has wrong view
The husband is unethical, of bad character, living at home with his heart full of the stain of stinginess, abusing and insulting ascetics and brahmins
The wife is also unethical, of bad character
How a male zombie lives with a goddess (: The husband is unethical, of bad character
The wife doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence
The wife doesn’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
The wife is contented, kind-hearted, with right view
The wife is ethical, of good character, living at home with her heart rid of the stain of stinginess, not abusing and insulting ascetics and brahmins
How a god lives with a female zombie (a: The husband is ethical, of good character
The wife is unethical, of bad character
How a god lives with a goddess (a causal: The husband is ethical, of good character
The wife is also ethical, of good character
